00010 class ImageFormat_raw: public FileFormat
00011 {
00012 protected:
00013     std::string suffixes()const {
00014         return std::string( "raw" );
00015     }
00016 public:
00017     std::string getName()const {
00018         return "raw data output";
00019     }
00020 
00021 
00022     int load ( std::list<data::Chunk> &chunks, const std::string &filename, const std::string &dialect )  throw( std::runtime_error & ) {
00023         throwGenericError( "Sorry raw input is not supported yet" );
00024         return 0;
00025     }
00026 
00027     void write( const data::Image &image, const std::string &filename, const std::string &dialect )  throw( std::runtime_error & ) {
00028         const std::pair<std::string, std::string> splitted = makeBasename( filename );
00029         std::string type = image.getMajorTypeName();
00030         type = type.substr( 0, type.find_last_not_of( '*' ) + 1 );
00031         const std::string outName = splitted.first + "_" + image.getSizeAsString() + "_" + type + splitted.second ;
00032 
00033         LOG( ImageIoLog, info ) << "Writing image of size " << image.getSizeAsVector() << " and type " << type << " to " << outName;
00034         std::ofstream out( outName.c_str() );
00035         out.exceptions( std::ios::failbit | std::ios::badbit );
00036         BOOST_FOREACH( const boost::shared_ptr<const data::Chunk > &ref, image.getChunksAsVector() ) {
00037             const boost::shared_ptr<void> data( ref->getValuePtrBase().getRawAddress() );
00038             const size_t data_size = ref->bytesPerVoxel() * ref->getVolume();
00039             out.write( static_cast<const char *>( data.get() ), data_size );
00040         }
00041     }
00042     bool tainted()const {return false;}//internal plugins are not tainted
00043 };
00044 }
00045 }
00046 isis::image_io::FileFormat *factory()
00047 {
00048     return new isis::image_io::ImageFormat_raw();
